Sentencas: Barium zirconate-based high-temperature proton conductors (HTPCs) exhibit excellent chemical stability in atmospheres containing CO2 or water vapor.
Titulo: Chemically stable and easily sintered high-temperature proton conductor BaZr0.8In0.2O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, such HPTCs haven't been widely used as electrolyte materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) due to their poor sintering activity.
Titulo: Chemically stable and easily sintered high-temperature proton conductor BaZr0.8In0.2O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, indium is selected as a dopant to improve the sintering activity of barium zirconate.
Titulo: Chemically stable and easily sintered high-temperature proton conductor BaZr0.8In0.2O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: BaZr0.8In0.2O3-delta (BZI) powders with a pure cubic perovskite structure are synthesized via a typical citric acid-nitrate gel combustion process.
Titulo: Chemically stable and easily sintered high-temperature proton conductor BaZr0.8In0.2O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The SEM results show that BZI exhibits improved sintering activity compared to the state-of-the-art proton conductor BaZr0.8Y0.2O3-delta (BZY), and fully dense BZI pellets with increased grain size are obtained after sintered at 1600 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Chemically stable and easily sintered high-temperature proton conductor BaZr0.8In0.2O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, BZI also keeps sufficiently high chemical stability as BZY.
Titulo: Chemically stable and easily sintered high-temperature proton conductor BaZr0.8In0.2O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of BZI under various atmospheres is investigated by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) in detail.
Titulo: Chemically stable and easily sintered high-temperature proton conductor BaZr0.8In0.2O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The total conductivity achieves 1.0 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) at 700 degrees C in wet H-2 (3% H2O).
Titulo: Chemically stable and easily sintered high-temperature proton conductor BaZr0.8In0.2O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Dense BZI electrolyte films are successfully fabricated on the anode substrates by a dry-pressing method after sintered at 1400 degrees C for 5 h in air.
Titulo: Chemically stable and easily sintered high-temperature proton conductor BaZr0.8In0.2O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Single cells with dense BZI electrolyte films are also assembled and tested to further evaluate the feasibility of BZI as an electrolyte material for proton-conducting SOFCs.
Titulo: Chemically stable and easily sintered high-temperature proton conductor BaZr0.8In0.2O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells
Chemically stable and easily sintered high-temperature proton conductor BaZr0.8In0.2O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells
